name: The Olive Street Agency
tagline: Solutions For Small Businesses, Brands, People
description:
A Boutique Agency specializing in Management and Digital Marketing services for the Music/Entertainment Industries & Small Businesses.  We build brand from scratch or pick up in the midst of brands and help to shape the future of them.  We help to tell stories.
Mission: We aim to heighten the awareness of people, brands, and businesses that the world can categorize as influential, innovative, and inspirational. We seek out pioneers in their fields and companies at the forefront of freshness.
